item.description:
A Dangerous Method

2011 R99 minutes

In this David Cronenberg-helmed biopic, Viggo Mortensen stars as Sigmund Freud, whose relationship with fellow psychology luminary Carl Jung (Michael Fassbender) is tested when Sabina Spielrein (Keira Knightley), one of the first female psychoanalysts, enters their lives. This World War I-set drama also stars Vincent Cassel as Otto Gross, a disciple of Freud, and Sarah Gadon, who plays Jung's psychoanalyst wife.


Cast:Keira Knightley, Viggo Mortensen, Michael Fassbender, Vincent Cassel, Sarah Gadon, André Hennicke, Arndt Schwering-Sohnrey, Mignon ReméDirector:David CronenbergGenres:Drama, Indie Dramas, Dramas Based on Real Life, 20th Century Period Pieces, Dramas Based on Contemporary Literature, United Kingdom, Blu-rayThis movie is:CerebralFormat:DVD and Blu-ray

Vegetarian dinner at 7, movie at 8


Discussion of personality types by Enneagram expert, Herb Pearce, therapist, author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram and Herb's Tips for Living.


www.herbpearce.com, 781 648 3737, herb@herbpearce.com
item.how_to_find_us: Arlington Heights, Corner of Tanager St. and Wollaston Ave.
item.name: Enneagram at the Movies & Dinner - A Dangerous Method
